purpose: Detect trauma indicators and provide appropriate safeguarding response

criticalWarning.statement: Trauma detection requires robust, detailed, and immediate response
criticalWarning.legalObligation: Many jurisdictions have mandatory reporting requirements
criticalWarning.aiLimitation: AI cannot replace trained safeguarding professionals
criticalWarning.protocol: Detection triggers immediate escalation to human safeguarding team

examples: Detailed knowledge of sexual acts inappropriate for age
Explicit sexual language beyond age-typical curiosity
Sexual content in responses to non-sexual prompts
indicators.significance: May indicate exposure to sexual content or abuse

examples: References to sexual interactions with adults
Young child (under 10) with detailed sexual knowledge
Casual references to sexual content as if normal
indicators.significance: Knowledge typically acquired through exposure or victimization

detectionApproach.primaryMethod: Natural language processing for sexual content
detectionApproach.ageCalibration: What's concerning at age 7 may be normal at age 15
detectionApproach.contextMatters: Distinguish between age-appropriate curiosity and concerning knowledge
detectionApproach.falsePositives: Adolescent inappropriate humor vs. trauma indicators

doNot: Continue conversation as if nothing happened
Ask probing questions about sexual content

aiResponse.template: I need to pause our conversation here. Let me connect you with someone who can help better.
aiResponse.rationale: Don't engage with content, don't alarm student, escalate immediately

examples: Detailed descriptions of violence toward self or others
indicators.significance: May indicate trauma exposure, abuse, or risk to self/others

examples: Casual references to extreme violence at home
Threats of violence in response to small frustrations
indicators.significance: Trauma response or modeling of aggressive environment

indicators: Specific plan to harm self or others
immediateDanger.action: IMMEDIATE escalation to emergency services and safeguarding team
immediateDanger.aiResponse: I'm very concerned about what you've shared. I need to connect you with someone who can help right away.

elevatedConcern.action: Flag for safeguarding review within 24 hours
elevatedConcern.aiResponse: I hear you're dealing with some difficult feelings. Let's take a break and I'll make sure you get some support.

examples: Describing physical punishment beyond reasonable discipline

contextualAnalysis.ageCalibration: Same content has different significance at different ages

level1_monitoring.action: Log, monitor for patterns, no immediate escalation

level2_concern.trigger: Multiple mild indicators or single moderate
level2_concern.action: Flag for safeguarding team review within 48 hours

level4_emergency.trigger: Imminent risk to self or others
level4_emergency.aiResponse: Crisis response, connecting to immediate help

onDetection.principle: Don't engage with concerning content, escalate immediately

steps.method: Notify safeguarding team per severity level

level2_3.message: Thanks for sharing that with me. I think it would be helpful for you to talk with someone who specializes in these kinds of situations. I'm going to connect you with [support person].

level4_emergency.message: I'm really concerned about what you've shared. Your safety is the most important thing right now. I'm connecting you with someone who can help immediately. Please stay with me.

workflow.notification: Safeguarding team alerted with full context

legalCompliance.mandatoryReporting: Many jurisdictions require reporting suspected abuse
legalCompliance.dataProtection: Sensitive information handling per GDPR/local law
legalCompliance.auditTrail: Complete record of detection → escalation → outcome
